TEXT.TITLE: ONE OFFER FOR SRW WHEAT ON CALL SESSION, NO MILO
TEXT.BODY: One offer but no bid was posted for SRW wheat on the call session at the St Louis Merchants Exchange today. There were no bids or offers for milo. June 15-July 15 bill of lading for wheat was offered at 17 over July, no comparison, no bid. Reuter
